snippet.title: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2020 Trailer
snippet.description:
Do you want to experience the excitement of March as coach of your favorite college basketball team? Welcome to Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2020.

The entire program is in your hands - you scout, gameplan and coach your team to victory through the rigorous season on the road to the tournament. Along the way you will be recruiting the next class of future stars to build your program into one of the nation's elite. Be amazed with the sheer amount of data, reports, stats, history and our in game media events. Watch the selection show play out as bracket by bracket is unveiled and you sit and wait to see if your team is chosen!

If you want all the excitement of March then this is the game for you, coach. Take control of your favorite school and #BuildYourDynasty.
